alberta.name: Alberta
alberta.funFact: The largest collection of complete dinosaur skeletons in the world can be found in Alberta.
alberta.notSoFunFact: Alberta has the 3rd-highest rate of drug-impaired driving incidents. 577 incidents in 2017.

all-drivers.desc: BAC alcohol over .08, over 2 ng/ml of blood of THC, a combination of .05 BAC + 2.5 ng/ml of blood of THC, refused to provide a breath or fluid sample

ontario.name: Ontario
ontario.funFact: Ontario covers over 415,000 square miles (one million square kilometers). This makes it larger than France and Spain combined.
ontario.notSoFunFact: Ontario has the 2nd highest rate of drug-impaired driving incidents. 653 incidents in 2017.
